[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/publisher/consensus_publisher.rs] [Function: start()] [Ticker Failure] Can the garbage_collection_interval ticker fail or panic, causing the select! to deadlock or exit the loop? (High)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/publisher/consensus_publisher.rs] [Function: start()] [Message Receiver Closure] If publisher_message_receiver closes due to all senders being dropped, does this cause the loop to exit via else branch, permanently stopping consensus publishing? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/consensus_observer/publisher/consensus_publisher.rs] [Function: spawn_message_serializer_and_sender()] [Task Lifecycle] Does the spawned tokio task run indefinitely until the channel closes, and can this task leak if the publisher is dropped without proper cleanup? (Medium)
